title: West Highland Way
description: Filled with misty glens, deep lochs, and endless rain while hiking from Milngavie to Fort William, the West Highland Way is a long-distance trail in the highlands of %location% spanning %distance%. The trail travels down many ancient roads and old coaching routes, journeying from the lowlands to the highlands, while camping overnight in fields, along lakeside beachs, and under bridges.

I was not prepared for the amount of rain nearly every day of this trek that took %days% to complete, and by the end of it I was chilled to the bone. But I witnessed some amazing mountains once I got into the Highlands.
